gamestart.name: 1. {race.argon}
gamestart.description: Chaos! Entire star systems vanish in between strange hyperspace anomalies. Your convoy gets hit during transit to Carida. Once a successful leader you are now lost in space and time...

gamestart.name: 2. {race.boron}
gamestart.description: Chaos! Entire star systems vanish in between strange hyperspace anomalies. Your convoy gets hit during transit to Honoghr. Once a successful leader you are now lost in space and time...

gamestart.name: 3. {race.paranid}
gamestart.description: Chaos! Entire star systems vanish in between strange hyperspace anomalies. Your convoy gets hit during transit to Saleucami. Once a successful leader you are now lost in space and time...

gamestart.name: 4. {race.split}
gamestart.description: Chaos! Entire star systems vanish in between strange hyperspace anomalies. Your convoy gets hit during transit to Alderaan. Once a successful leader you are now lost in space and time...

gamestart.name: 5. {race.teladi}
gamestart.description: Chaos! Entire star systems vanish in between strange hyperspace anomalies. Your convoy gets hit during transit to Naboo. Once a successful leader you are now lost in space and time...

gamestart.name: 6. {race.terran}
gamestart.description: Not supported by SWM3 !!! - This is a special gamestart in which you are the only faction and must conquer a whole galaxy full of Xenons. Not recommended for newcomers.
